short_summary: Packing and bolt impeller requirements for Canadian Navy
description: The Canadian Navy requires supplies of packing and bolt impellers. The suppliers must submit prices in CAD and documents may be submitted in French or English. The bid must be on an open bidding system and closed on May 17, 2024. The contact information is as follows: Christopher Cauchi, christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca, (555) 555-5555.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
==============================

**Title (English/French)**
------------------------

* GSIN 53 Packaging, Bolt Impeller / Emballage NIBS 53, Turbine boulonnée
* Solicitation Number (English/French)            : W8482-231394/A
* Amendment Number (English/French)              : 3
* Publication Date (English)                      : 2023-05-10
* Tender Closing Date (English)                  : 2023-06-09T14:00:00 ( Expired )
* Amendment Date (English)                       : 2023-06-09

**Solicitation Overview**
------------------------

The National Defence Department is seeking proposals for the supply of the items listed below. Deliveries are required at the following locations:
* CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia (20 units)
* CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia (23 units)

**Required Items**
-----------------

* Packaging with Retainer, GSIN: N5330, NSN: 01-3286901, Quantity: 20, Unit of Issue: EA
* Packaging with Retainer, GSIN: N5330, NSN: 01-3286901, Quantity: 23, Unit of Issue: EA
* Bolt Impeller Retaining, GSIN: N5306, NSN: 21-2594616, Quantity: 18, Unit of Issue: EA
* Bolt Impeller Retaining, GSIN: N5306, NSN: 21-2594616, Quantity: 6, Unit of Issue: EA

**Specifications**
-----------------

Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, part number, and NCAGE.

Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars only. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

**Preferential Treatment**
-------------------------

This requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and services.

**Language**
------------

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Attachments**
---------------

Tender notices and amendments can be viewed on Canada.ca.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Christopher Cauchi, christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca, (555) 555-5555

This rewritten entry is more concise, clear, and follows professional formatting standards.

Note:  I kept the same markdown format as in your original example 

Please feel free to ask if you need any modifications! I can include more details
